original: HALLQUIST, Carl Anton, Sadelmakaremästare, Landskrona, f Lund 25/8 85 av Carl Fredrik H o Anna Dahlstedt. Prakt Kävlinge, Teckomatorp, Malmö o Lkr. Ag sadelmakeri, sport- o reseffektaff (grund 09). Led hdls-kamm, folksk.styr, v. ordf lärl- & yrkessk, ordf barnbespisn, styr.led Skånemäss o dess förvaltn.utsk, kass Lkr.utställn 29, ordf Lkr hantv- o ind.frn, styr.led Sv hantv- o små-ind.org, dir AB O Magnusson o Lkr kreditfrn. Resor: Tyskl 21, Norge, Danm. RVO, Odd Fellow, SiriusO; Sv hantv.org ftJM o mast-brev, Sk fotb.frbs dipl. Hobby: Fotboll.
translated: HALLQUIST, Carl Anton, Master Saddlemaker, Landskrona, born Lund 25/8 1885 to Carl Fredrik H and Anna Dahlstedt. Practical experience from Kävlinge, Teckomatorp, Malmö, and surrounding areas. Owns a saddlery business focused on sport and travel equipment (established in 1909). Holds positions of leadership in the trade chamber, the school board, vice chairman of the apprentice and vocational school, chairman of the child feeding program, board member of Skånemäss and its management committee, treasurer of the regional exhibition in 1929, chairman of the regional crafts and industrial association, board member of the Swedish crafts and small-industry organization, director of AB O Magnusson and Lkr credit association. Travelled to Germany in 1921, and to Norway and Denmark. Received decorations and honors from the Royal Swedish Society of Crafts and Trades, Odd Fellow, and Sirius Order. Holds a diploma from the Swedish football federation. Hobbies include football.
